title: Enjoy our pool and your 20' balcony this Summer...2BR/2BA $1,594
posting_body: Our larger (1,100 sq ft, REMODELED finish - stainless appliances/dark cabinets, with a walk-out balcony) TWO-BEDROOM, TWO-BATHROOM prices today are starting at $1,594/month!!!
Available for
AUGUST 6, 2022
move-in, upon application approval!!
Welcome to The Crossing at Eagle Pond Apartment Homes.
We're an apartment community conveniently located near major expressways, local shopping, dining, and entertainment.
Our beautiful community offers top notch amenities and beautifully designed apartment homes.
We are proud to offer spacious studio, one, and two bedroom apartment homes in an amazing atmosphere and convenient location.
Here, our residents always come first with remarkable service provided by the Leasing Staff and Maintenance Technicians.
Here's just a list of some of the amenities you'll enjoy as a resident at the Crossing at Eagle Pond Apartment Homes:
Central Air Conditioning
Dishwasher
Garbage Disposal
Microwave
Range
Refrigerator
Oven
3 sets of washers and dryers on every floor for your convenience.
Storage units available on every floor for a small monthly fee
Private, fenced-in Bark Park
One private carport included free of charge
24/7 upgraded fitness center
Resident lounge with complimentary WiFi
On-site maintenance with 24-hour emergency service
Professional and friendly Leasing and Maintenance staff
Call Marge at
show contact info
and ask about TODAY’S rates and specials!!!
